colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA @012B BA 'DI, MCHED 'GROGS AEM CHI BKA' BCU PA DANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS SOG YUL 'DIR GAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANG PA'I BKRA SHIS PA 'BYUNG 'DUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA'I BYIN RLABS SOGS MED PA'I SOG YIG TSIG LTAR CAN GYI SUNG  'DZIN PA BKA' SNANG MANG NGO, ,RANG RIG LHA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGO MA CHOD PAR SBYIN SREG GI THAB BSKYED DANG, SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUG CHEN MO'I GA-YANG 'GUG BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' ZHIG 'DUS NAS RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I STENG DU NYER SPYOD LNGA DANG LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR KHU DANG CHANG GI @013A *, ,'BUL SOGS KYI BSNAN TE NOM CHI KO'U SHRI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS SO, ,'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I NONGS PA BAD MCHIS NA, ,BLA MA LHA LA BSHAGS BZOD PAR GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD MCHIS PA'I GANG THOB DGES, ,'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
